main event: Multiple UFO sightings and encounters in Atlanta, Georgia in 1953 and surrounding areas.
interesting points: Witnesses observed a flying saucer-shaped object with three small creatures, one of which was hit by a car.
A reported sighting of a large, unidentified flying object over Sherman, Texas in 1953.
An investigation by Project Blue Book was inconclusive despite attempts to photograph the object seen in Atlanta, Georgia.
A widely publicized space creature sightings and subsequent investigation revealed it was a hoax involving a shaved monkey.
An extensive wave of UFO sightings over Oklahoma and Texas, with reports of multicolored objects, bizarre movements, and speed.
sighted object: Flying saucer-shaped object, unidentified flying objects
location: Atlanta, Georgia, Sherman, Texas, Wynnewood, Oklahoma, Denton, Texas, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
